wireframe

Class AbstractWireframeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • wireframe.AbstractElement
      • wireframe.AbstractWireframeElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Groupable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComboBox, Header, Image, ListElement, Paragraph, ProgressBar, RoundedBox, ScrollBar, Slider, Text

    public class AbstractWireframeElement
extends AbstractElement
implements Groupable
    A wireframe element this, simply, not an Annotation. The properties differentiating an AbstractWireframeElement from an AbstractElement are lockability, groupability, and the ability to have annotations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractWireframeElement(Location location)
      Constructs a AbstractWireframeElement with specified location.

        Constructs a AbstractWireframeElement with specified location. Defaults this element to unlocked with no parent group and no annotations.
